languages.text: Стоит подойти ближе, как неизвестное судно немедленно направляет заряженные орудия прямо на вас. Еще несколько кораблей выплывают из тени дрейфующих астероидов, стискивая вас в кольцо. Насмешливое приветствия капитана Ксанфы Ла Буш с предложением выгодно обменять вашу жизнь на ее душевное удовлетворение приводит команду в ярость. И все же ситуация патовая — вы можете вступить в неравный бой и потерять все, или же постыдно откупиться, пожертвовав лишь собственной гордостью.

traits.locale_text: Стоит подойти ближе, как неизвестное судно немедленно направляет заряженные орудия прямо на вас. Еще несколько кораблей тихо выплывают из тени дрейфующих астероидов, стискивая вас в кольцо. Насмешливое приветствия капитана Ксанфы Ла Буш с предложением выгодно обменять вашу жизнь на ее душевное удовлетворение приводит команду в ярость. И все же ситуация патовая — вы можете вступить в неравный бой и потерять все, или же постыдно откупиться, пожертвовав лишь собственной гордостью.

languages.text: As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.
languages.original_text: Стоит подойти ближе, как неизвестное судно немедленно направляет заряженные орудия прямо на вас. Еще несколько кораблей выплывают из тени дрейфующих астероидов, стискивая вас в кольцо. Насмешливое приветствия капитана Ксанфы Ла Буш с предложением выгодно обменять вашу жизнь на ее душевное удовлетворение приводит команду в ярость. И все же ситуация патовая — вы можете вступить в неравный бой и потерять все, или же постыдно откупиться, пожертвовав лишь собственной гордостью.

traits.locale_text: As soon as you get in the unknown ship's proximity, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, encircling you tightly. Captain Xantha La Bouche's mocking greetings and her "offer of a lifetime" to exchange your survival for her "mental comfort" infuriate your crew. But the situation is a stalemate: you can either get into an unequal fight and lose everything, or shamefully buy your way out sacrificing only your pride.

As soon as you get in the unknown ship's proximity, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, encircling you tightly. Captain Xantha La Bouche's mocking greetings and her "offer of a lifetime" to exchange your survival for her "mental comfort" infuriate your crew. But the situation is a stalemate: you can either get into an unequal fight and lose everything, or shamefully buy your way out sacrificing only your pride.

As soon as you get in the unknown ship's proximity, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, encircling you tightly. Captain Xantha La Bouche's mocking greetings and her "offer of a lifetime" to exchange your life for her "peace of mind" infuriate your crew. But the situation is a stalemate: you can either get into an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully buy your way out, sacrificing only your pride.

As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

languages.text: 当你刚刚靠近那艘不明舰船时，它就将已经装填完毕的宏炮对准了你。随后，几艘飞船从漂浮的小行星的阴影之中出现，将你团团包围。赞莎·拉·布歇舰长以嘲弄的语气问候着你，并提出了个建议。只要你愿意支付保护费，就可以安然离开，但你支付的资源必须能让她得到“灵魂的满足”。这个厚颜无耻的提议让你的船员们大为光火。你处于两难的困境中：要么牺牲一切，在这场处于劣势的战斗中殊死一搏；要么牺牲自尊，屈辱地掏钱保命。
languages.original_text: As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

traits.locale_text: 当你刚刚靠近那艘不明舰船时，它就将已经装填完毕的巨炮对准了你。随后，几艘飞船从漂浮的小行星的阴影之中出现，将你团团包围。赞莎·拉·布歇舰长以嘲弄的语气问候着你，并提出了个建议。只要你愿意支付保护费，就可以安然离开，但你支付的资源必须能让她得到“灵魂的满足”。这个厚颜无耻的提议让你的船员们大为光火。你处于两难的困境中：要么牺牲一切，在这场处于劣势的战斗中殊死一搏；要么牺牲自尊，屈辱地掏钱保命。

languages.text: En cuanto te acercas a la nave desconocida, te apunta con sus cañones cargados. Varias otras naves emergen desde las sombras de los asteroides a la deriva, rodeándote. La capitana Xantha La Bouche te dirige un saludo burlón y una propuesta: puedes comprar su misericordia, pero el precio debe «satisfacer su alma». Esta ultrajante sugerencia enfurece a tu tripulación. No hay forma de ganar en esta situación: puedes emprender una batalla desigual y perderlo todo o pagar para salvar tu lamentable pellejo, sacrificando solo tu orgullo.
languages.original_text: As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto te acercas a la nave desconocida, te apunta con sus cañones cargados. Varias otras naves emergen desde las sombras de los asteroides a la deriva, rodeándote. La capitana Xantha La Bouche te dirige un saludo burlón y una propuesta: puedes comprar su misericordia, pero el precio debe «satisfacer su alma». Esta ultrajante sugerencia enfurece a tu tripulación. No hay forma de ganar en esta situación: puedes emprender una batalla desigual y perderlo todo o pagar para salvar tu lamentable pellejo, sacrificando solo tu orgullo.

languages.text: 知らない船に近づくと、装填されたキャノン砲をすぐさま直接こちらに向けてきた。他の数隻も小惑星の漂う陰影から現れ、ガッチリと周りを取り囲んでいる。船長のジャンサ・ラ・ブッシュは嘲笑いながらこちらを出迎え、提案をする。この道を開けてやることもできるが、その対価は「魂の満足度」に沿うものでなければならないと。とんでもない提案にクルーは激怒する。勝ち目のないシナリオに置かれた。不公平な戦いに応じてすべてを失うか、恥をさらして物品を与え身を守り、プライドを犠牲にするかだ。
languages.original_text: As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

traits.locale_text: 知らない船に近づくと、装填されたキャノン砲をすぐさま直接こちらに向けてきた。他の数隻も小惑星の漂う陰影から現れ、ガッチリと周りを取り囲んでいる。船長のジャンサ・ラ・ブッシュは嘲笑いながらこちらを出迎え、提案をする。この道を開けてやることもできるが、その対価は「魂の満足度」に沿うものでなければならないと。とんでもない提案にクルーは激怒する。勝ち目のないシナリオに置かれた。不公平な戦いに応じてすべてを失うか、恥をさらして物品を与え身を守り、プライドを犠牲にするかだ。

languages.text: Kaum hast du dich dem unbekannten Schiff genähert, richtet es seine geladenen Kanonen direkt auf dich. Mehrere andere Schiffe tauchen aus den Schatten von Asteroiden auf und umzingeln dich. Captain Xantha La Bouche sendet einen spöttischen Gruß und einen Vorschlag: Du kannst sie bezahlen, um weiterfliegen zu dürfen, aber der Preis muss ihr "seelische Zufriedenheit verschaffen". Der unerhörte Vorschlag weckt den Zorn deiner Crew. Du kannst in diesem Szenario nicht gewinnen. Du kannst entweder einen ungleichen Kampf beginnen und alles verlieren, oder schmachvoll bezahlen, um deine Haut zu retten, und damit nur deinen Stolz opfern.
languages.original_text: As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

Mehrere andere Schiffe tauchen aus den Schatten von Asteroiden auf und umzingeln dich. Captain Xantha La Bouche sendet einen spöttischen Gruß und einen Vorschlag: Du kannst sie bezahlen, um weiterfliegen zu dürfen, aber der Preis muss ihr "seelische Zufriedenheit verschaffen". Der unerhörte Vorschlag weckt den Zorn deiner Crew. Du kannst in diesem Szenario nicht gewinnen. Du kannst entweder einen ungleichen Kampf beginnen und alles verlieren, oder schmachvoll bezahlen, um deine Haut zu retten, und damit nur deinen Stolz opfern.

languages.text: Dès que vous approchez du vaisseau inconnu, il pointe ses canons chargés sur vous. Plusieurs autres vaisseaux émergent de derrière des astéroïdes pour vous encercler. La capitaine Xantha La Bouche vous salue d'un air moqueur et vous fait une proposition : vous pouvez acheter votre droit de passage, mais votre contribution doit « satisfaire son âme ». Cette proposition révoltante provoque la colère de votre équipage. Il n'y a pas de bonne solution : vous pouvez vous engager dans un combat défavorable et tout perdre, ou sauver votre peau en vous abaissant à payer le prix demandé.
languages.original_text: As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.

traits.locale_text: Dès que vous approchez du vaisseau inconnu, il pointe ses canons chargés sur vous. Plusieurs autres vaisseaux émergent de derrière des astéroïdes pour vous encercler. La capitaine Xantha La Bouche vous salue d'un air moqueur et vous fait une proposition : vous pouvez acheter votre droit de passage, mais votre contribution doit « satisfaire son âme ». Cette proposition révoltante provoque la colère de votre équipage. Il n'y a pas de bonne solution : vous pouvez vous engager dans un combat défavorable et tout perdre, ou sauver votre peau en vous abaissant à payer le prix demandé.

languages.text: Meçhul gemiye yaklaşır yaklaşmaz o da dolu toplarını doğrudan gemine doğrultuyor. Sürüklenen asteroitlerin gölgelerinden birkaç başka gemi daha ortaya çıkarak gemiyi sıkıca kuşatıyor. Kaptan Xantha La Bouche, alaycı bir selamın üzerine bir teklifte bulunuyor: Buradan bir bedel olarak çıkmak mümkün ancak bu bedel, "ruhunu tatmin etmek" zorunda. Bu çirkin öneri, mürettebatı öfkeye sürüklüyor. Çıkışı olmayan bir durumdasın: Güç durumda kalacağın bir savaşa girip her şeyi kaybedebilir veya gerekli bedeli ödeyip sadece gururunu feda edebilir ve utanç içinde canını kurtarabilirsin.
languages.original_text: As soon as you draw close to the unknown ship, it points its loaded cannons directly at you. Several other ships emerge from the shadows of drifting asteroids, tightly encircling you. Captain Xantha La Bouche offers a mocking greeting and a proposition: you can buy your way out of this, but the price must be to her "soul's satisfaction." The outrageous suggestion sends your crew into a fury. You are in a no-win scenario: you can enter an uneven fight and lose everything, or shamefully pay to save your skin, sacrificing only your pride.
